entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 March 2023
